DOC.brief_summary: To validate outcome measure tolerability Kuvan treatment improvement behavioral symptom 10 select adult Phenylketonuria ( PKU ) without mental retardation .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Effects Kuvan Individuals With Phenylketonuria ( PKU ) With Maladaptive Behaviors
DOC.criteria: Biochemical confirmation PKU , Measurable maladaptive behavior baseline , Signed informed consent , Not pregnant lactating , Females birth control applicable , Willing comply . Subjects care provider unreliable , use investigational product within 30 day prior enrollment , Pregnant lactating , Concurrent disease condition would interfere study participation safety , ie multiple psychotropic med , condition PI render subject high risk , drug inhibit folate synthesis , Concurrent use levodopa .
